description:
At Wells Fargo, we are looking for a Lead Analytics Consultant - Remediation Analytics to join our team. As a Lead Analytics Consultant, you will play a key role in supporting and executing the remediation analytics strategy to ensure our customers get the best possible experience.We are looking for someone who has strong quantitative and analytical skills and the ability to think beyond the data. You should have an understanding of the data and analytics environment and the ability to work with multiple stakeholders to ensure data accuracy. The ideal candidate should have a passion for problem-solving, be comfortable working in a fast-paced environment, and be able to adjust quickly to changing requirements.Qualifications include:• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or related field• 5+ years of experience in data analytics, data mining, and/or predictive modeling• Advanced proficiency with SQL, Python, R, and/or other programming languages• Knowledge of data visualization tools (Tableau, QlikView, etc.)• Excellent communication and interpersonal skillsIf you have the qualifications listed above and are looking to make a difference in the customer experience, we would love to hear from you!

Responsibilities:

Develop and maintain remediation analytics strategy to ensure customer experience is improved.
Analyze data and create models to gain insights and uncover trends.
Utilize SQL, Python, R, and other programming languages to execute analytics tasks.
Design and implement data visualization tools (Tableau, QlikView, etc.) to improve understanding of data.
Collaborate with multiple stakeholders to ensure data accuracy.
Adapt quickly to changing requirements.
Provide technical guidance and mentor other team members.
Monitor and report on analytics progress to the management team.
Stay up-to-date with the latest analytics technologies and trends.

Wells Fargo is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
